statements: SELECT * FROM order_processing;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM order_processing WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order_processing WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM order_processing WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM order_processing GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 2000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM order_processing WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM order_processing WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM order_processing WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, customer_id FROM order_processing ORDER BY total_amount DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM order_processing GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_cost FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity*price) AS total_cost FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE oi.quantity > 10 AND oi.price < 50
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.price FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE oi.quantity IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_cost FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name, Order_Items.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.customer_id = 2;

SELECT Orders.order_id, SUM(Order_Items.quantity * Products.unit_price) AS total_order_amount FROM Orders JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY Orders.order_id HAVING total_order_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT trigger_name, action, timestamp FROM triggers ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, status, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, customer_id, status FROM Orders WHERE status='Pending'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM OrderDetails
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, status FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Pending' AND customer_id = 2;
SELECT od.order_id, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM OrderDetails od JOIN Products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.quantity > 5 ORDER BY od.order_id ASC;
